values: 步，步速，步伐；速度，节奏；踱方步，踱步于
The pace of something is the speed at which it happens.
I ran the race at a slower pace than my friend.
n. 一步；步速；步伐；速度 vi. 踱步；缓慢而行 vt. 踱步于；用步测
vt. 以步测量，步测为…定步速

n. 一步；步速；步伐；速度
To pace is to walk or move back and forth repeatedly in a confined space.
Pace is the speed or rate at which something moves or progresses.
n. 一步；步速；步伐；速度,vi. 踱步；缓慢而行,vt. 踱步于；用步测
